name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Katsuki Bakugo My Hero Academia Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the explosive power of Katsuki Bakugo from My Hero Academia with this dynamic Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring stunning live wallpapers of Bakugo in his intense action-packed moments, this extension brings his fiery personality and unmatched determination to your new tab page.

Features:
🎨 High-quality live wallpaper of Katsuki Bakugo in his explosive action.
🌐 Customizable search bar for your preferred search engine.
🕒 Clock and date display for a more functional browsing experience.
🔗 Quick-access shortcuts for easy navigation to your favorite sites.
Feel the power of Bakugo’s explosive energy every time you open a new tab, adding a touch of intensity to your browsing experience. Perfect for fans of My Hero Academia and action-packed anime.

More extensions: https://haberikra.com/
Contact us: https://haberikra.com/contact-us/
Privacy policy: https://haberikra.com/privacy-policy/
